_sText:
mg_nemball by Nemesis

The idea is to put the ball into the opponents goals before they do the same to you. Simple right?.

To add in some extra fun there are ramps around the map that allow the players to boost off and get to places faster. After 5 minutes into the game scouts will also spawn on the top platforms for players to use

Extra features include:
-x2 run speed 
-Half gravity so its easier to jump with speed.
-Air acceleration (to turn of course).
-A funny looking ball.
-A button that will play music in game.

Anything else will probably be explained at the start of each round once the map is started.
